LanguageData.Cat.label: cat
LanguageData.Cat.description: One of mankind's first pets, the cat is a small mammal which hunts vermin. Known for their aloofness, cats are nevertheless popular companions because of their independence, calm disposition, and fine, pettable fur.
LanguageData.Cat.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Cat.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Cat.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.GuineaPig.label: guinea pig
LanguageData.GuineaPig.description: Neither a pig or a creature from Guinea, these little rodents are bred to be a household pet and a delicious dinner.
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Husky.label: husky
LanguageData.Husky.description: A large, energetic dog with a thick fur coat for remaining comfortable in arctic environments.
LanguageData.Husky.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Husky.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Husky.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.label: labrador retriever
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.description: A very versatile, medium-sized dog. Originally bred to retrieve birds shot on the hunt, the lab is also an excellent guard dog, play pal, and family friend.
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Monkey.label: monkey
LanguageData.Monkey.description: A small primate, the monkey can use its curly tail to grab on to branches, leaving its hands free to do other things. Monkeys are selfish but clever, and can be trained to carry out fairly complex tasks.
LanguageData.Monkey.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.Monkey.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.Monkey.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.label: yorkshire terrier
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.description: A small, even-tempered dog. Originally bred to hunt rats, it later became a show and companionship animal. Some consider it useless, but the mood boost it gives by nuzzling can outweigh the cost of feeding it.
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.tools.head.label: head
